entry.title: Northgard
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼š$290.00 â†’ $90.00 [$90.00 ~ $290.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼š$90.00

Appå…§è³¼è²·

  • Clan of the snakeï¼š$90.00
  • Clan of the Horseï¼š$90.00
  • Scale Bundleï¼š$220.00
  • Fur Bundleï¼š$220.00
  • Clan of the Dragonï¼š$90.00
  • Clan of the Krakenï¼š$90.00
  • Clan of the Ratï¼š$90.00
  • Clan of the Squirrelï¼š$90.00
  • Clan of the Lynxï¼š$90.00
  • Winter Bundleï¼š$220.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Northgard is a strategy game based on Norse mythology in which you control a Clan of Vikings fighting for the control of a mysterious newfound continent. After years of tireless explorations, brave Vikings have discovered a new land filled with mystery, danger and riches: NORTHGARD. The boldest Northmen have set sail to explore and conquer these new shores, bring fame to their Clan and write history through conquest, trading, or devotion to the Gods. That is, if they can survive the dire Wolves and Undead Warriors roaming the land, befriend or defeat the giants, and survive the harshest winters ever witnessed in the North. FEATURES â€¢ Build your settlement on the newly discovered continent of Northgard â€¢ Assign your vikings to various jobs (Farmer, Warrior, Sailor, Loremaster...) â€¢ Manage your resources carefully and survive harsh winters and vicious foes â€¢ Expand and discover new territory with unique strategic opportunities â€¢ Achieve different victory conditions (Conquest, Fame, Lore, Trading...) STORY MODE: RIGâ€™S SAGA The Viking High King is murdered and his Regal Horn is stolen by a man named Hagen. This event kickstarts a saga that will take Rig, his son and heir accompanied by his right-hand man Brand through the new continent of Northgard. The continent where he will make new friends and foes and discover a much greater threat than Hagen, and the reasons behind his fatherâ€™s assassination. MULTIPLAYER â€¢ Play with or against other Mobile players with up to 6 players â€¢ Includes Duel, Free for All and Teamplay modes CHOOSE YOUR CLAN In order to complete the 11 campaign chapters, the player will have to master the specificities of the 6 first clans and tame the unforgiving wilderness of Northgard. More clans are joining the fight for Northgard! â€¢ Clan of the Snake: Act from the shadows and take the lead with cunning guerilla tactics â€¢ Clan of the Dragon: Embrace the old ways and please the gods with sacrifices â€¢ Clan of the Kraken: Harness the bounty of the sea and unleash its brutal might You can unlock the clans of the Snake, Dragon and Kraken separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Scale Bundle. â€¢ Clan of the Horse: Devote yourself to the art of blacksmithing and craft powerful Relics â€¢ Clan of the Ox: Equip ancestral equipment and prove the might of your forefathers â€¢ Clan of the Lynx: Adopt Natureâ€™s way and lure mythical preys into ambushes You can unlock the Clans of the Horse, Ox and Lynx separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Fur Bundle. â€¢ Clan of the Squirrel: Gather ingredients to prepare special recipes and survive the harsh winters â€¢ Clan of the Rat: Embrace the way of the Shamans and work for the clan â€¢ Clan of the Eagle: Occupy a large territory, venture outside and gather resources Unlock the clans of the Squirrel, Rat and Eagle separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Winter Bundle. Carefully redesigned for mobile â€¢ Revamped interface â€¢ Game Center achievements â€¢ iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices If you experience any issue with Northgard, please contact our customer support at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

entry.title: Black Border 2
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼š$50.00 â†’ $30.00 [$20.00 ~ $50.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼š$30.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Inspect papers, prevent smugglingâ€”keep the border safe or profit from corruption. Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game. Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants. Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy. Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets. Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country. NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer. Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience. Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully. Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband. Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty. Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband. Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security? Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

åº”ç”¨æˆªå±

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Motorsport Manager Mobile 3
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯

  • Game Editorï¼š$220.00
  • Bundleï¼š$150.00
  • Chairman's Paymentï¼š$220.00
  • Investmentï¼š$60.00
  • Large Investmentï¼š$90.00
  • Very Large Investmentï¼š$120.00
  • Huge Investmentï¼š$190.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Motorsport Manager Mobile 3 is the ultimate race team strategy game. Build up your very own motorsport team from scratch, making every big decision. Hire the drivers, assemble the team, develop your car and mastermind your way to glory. â€¢ This is your racing team. Hire drivers, develop your car and invest in technology. â€¢ Work with your drivers to achieve the perfect qualifying lap. â€¢ Formulate the ideal pitstop strategy to win races. â€¢ Watch the race in real-time or jump into the strategy screens to take control of the action. â€¢ React to weather changes, crashes and safety car periods. â€¢ Win championships across the world to reach the pinnacle of motorsport. New in MM Mobile 3 ===================== GT AND ENDURANCE RACING With 6 new championships, MM Mobile 3 is bigger and better than ever before. GT races bring action-packed, wheel-to-wheel action, while Endurance is a Motorsport Managerâ€™s ultimate strategic challenge, with 3 drivers per car and timed races! A STUNNING SETTING Monaco makes its Motorsport Manager debut! Manage your cars around la Rascasse, Casino Square and the Swimming Pool. Itâ€™s the ultimate test, rendered in a beautiful, detailed new art style. AUGMENTED REALITY AR support brings you the ultimate camera mode! Choose your own perspective on the race. Peer over trees, through bridges and down cliffsides as you experience races in a whole new way. NEW FEATURES The Supplier Network sees managers grow their teamâ€™s presence around the globe, while Invitational Races are huge annual events, bringing international races with a unique twist. Mechanics are the new members of your team, and their relationship with the driver is all-important! GAME CHANGERS Votes on rule changes, dynamic AI team movement (including teams going bust and being replaced) and new difficulty settings mean that the world of motorsport constantly evolves â€“ but the challenge stays at your level. ON-TRACK ACTION Energy Recovery System, with Hybrid and Power modes, mixes up every race! Will you boost your way past your rivals into clear air, or smartly manage your fuel levels to pull off a genius strategy?

entry.title: SmallFish Chess for Stockfish
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼š$150.00 â†’ å…è²» [å…è²» ~ $150.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šå…è²»

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

SmallFish is a project based on the Stockfish chess engine. It uses the latest Stockfish chess engine (Stockfish 17.1), rated about Elo 3600+ and is the strongest chess app on the App Store. SmallFish offers you three distinct ways to improve your game. You can review your game with comments, or study how Stockfish thinks, or track your progress. No in-app purchase, no ads, no data tracking. SmallFish is simply amazing. It's small but powerful, you'll be surprised. Features --------- - Blunder checking - Multiple line analysis - Graphical evaluation of your game - Game previews - Dark mode support - Endgame tablebase - Opening books Why not just download and try it yourself?

entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯

Appå…§è³¼è²·

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼š$60.00

Appå…§è³¼è²·

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced Toolsï¼š$150.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app. Notepad++ also includes a Todayâ€™s Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders. In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place. Key Features:- - Notes & Organization â€¢ Unlimited notes storage â€¢ Multiple note colors â€¢ Pinned & private notes â€¢ Custom font styles & font sizes â€¢ Sort notes by name or date â€¢ Auto-delete notes after a selected time â€¢ Easy note sharing â€¢ One-tap quick note creation - Security â€¢ App lock with multiple passcode options â€¢ Touch ID & Face ID support - iCloud Sync â€¢ iCloud sync for notes â€¢ Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud - Widgets & Notifications â€¢ Widget for todayâ€™s notes â€¢ Notifications for daily notes & reminders - PDF Editor & Manager â€¢ Create and manage PDF files â€¢ Edit existing PDFs â€¢ Export notes as PDF â€¢ Share PDFs easily â€¢ Add signatures and stamps to PDFs â€¢ Store and organize PDFs in one place Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications. Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected. Thank you for using this app. Weâ€™re committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!
